attributes.action: Undertake to launch a binding, ten-year moratorium on any new or extended taxes within the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, like many of my Countrymen, am appalled at the ever-increasing tax burden (overt and covert) on UK Business and Citizenry. I believe that government should have no right to demand, but instead should ask and justify and only then, if agreed by the population, receive the funds it wants. I would urge the Prime Minister to heed and apply a principle of 'Not One Penny More'.
